text: ‘Yetiya tomara bayerae khoja karhi gai achila, tara pichata (yetiya gai pale) te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i tomalokaka ene karaobara sandhana dimane yiye e'i sisura dayitbabhara laba paraiba’? Phalata ami tomaka tomara matrra ocaralai ghuraa'i anilo, yate te'omra caku jura parae arau sokata bhani naparae, arau tumi ejana byaktika hatya karaichila; tathapi'o ami tomaka manokastara paraa mukti dichilo arau ami tomaka bahu paraiksa karaicho. He mucha! Tara pichata tumi ke'iba bacharao mada'inabasira majata arasthana karaichila, iyara pichata tumi nirdharaita samayata upasthita ha’la
